Author: jl777c#5810
Content: yes, gtc:1 to JSON and then it will loop on the request every 5 minutes until cancelled

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: there is also a fill flag that can make it accept partial fills or only complete fills

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: a gtc order will stop even with a partial fill

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: it is a signal that it is a gtc order
